name: dICE_BREAKER
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022!

It's 1990XX! You are an elite dice hacker. Cut through ice to uncover sweet cyber cash caches. Build up a war chest and bail out before it gets too hot!

Click and drag the dice and "HACK" button to the ice and treasure to break them. "HACK" always is a value of 1. Overshooting ice values causes Heat- perfectsies will reduce your Heat.

Click "END" to refresh some Dice, also adds Heat.
"BAIL" ends the run.

Made in just 12 hours
Stuff I'd add next:
- map generation
- enemies
- deckbuilding, and upgrading mechanics
